00036     template <unsigned D, typename N = double> class Vector {
00037 
00038         public:
00039 
00040         //----------  management  ----------
00042

00048 
00049         //----------  access      ----------
00050

00054         N &operator[] (unsigned i);
00056 
00058         N operator[] (unsigned i) const;
00059 
00061         static unsigned dimension (void);
00062 
00063         //----------  arithmetics ----------
00064 
00067         Vector<D, N> &operator+= (const Vector<D, N> &Y);
00070         Vector<D, N> &operator-= (const Vector<D, N> &Y);
00073         Vector<D, N> &operator*= (const N &s);
00074 
00076         Vector<D, N> operator- (void) const;
00079         Vector<D, N> operator+ (const Vector<D, N> &Y) const;
00082         Vector<D, N> operator- (const Vector<D, N> &Y) const;
00085         Vector<D, N> operator* (const N &s) const;
00087 
00089         N operator* (const Vector<D, N> &X) const;
00092         Vector<D, N> operator/ (const N &s) const;
00094 
00096         Vector<D, N> operator/ (const Vector<D, N> &X) const;
00097 
00099         N sqnorm (void) const;
00100 
00102         bool operator==(const Vector<D, N> &other) const {
00103             for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++) {
00104                 if (x[i] != other[i]) return false;
00105             }
00106             return true;
00107         }
00108 
00110 
00112         bool operator<(const Vector<D, N> &other) const {
00113             if (sqnorm() == other.sqnorm()) {
00114                 for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++) {
00115                     if (x[i] < other[i]) return true;
00116                     if (x[i] > other[i]) return false;
00117                 }
00118             }
00119             return sqnorm() < other.sqnorm();
00120         }
00121 
00123 
00124         N *data () { return x; }
00125 
00127 
00128         template <typename T>
00129             operator const T * () const {
00130                 static T data[D];
00131                 for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++) data[i] = (T)x[i];
00132                 return data;
00133             }
00134 
00135     private:
00136         N x[D]; 
00137     };

00146     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00147             Vector<D, N>::Vector() : x () {
00148         for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++) x[i] = 0;
00149     }
00150 
00151     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00152             Vector<D, N>::Vector (N x0, ... ) :
00153             x () {
00154         x[0] = x0;
00155         unsigned i = 0;
00156         va_list argp;
00157         va_start (argp, x0);
00158         for (i = 1; i < D; i++) {
00159             x[i] = va_arg (argp, N);
00160         }
00161         va_end (argp);
00162     }

00166     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00167             N &Vector<D, N>::operator[] (unsigned i) {
00168         assert(i < D);
00169         return x[i];
00170     }
00171 
00172     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00173             N Vector<D, N>::operator[] (unsigned i) const {
00174         assert(i < D);
00175         return x[i];
00176     }

00180         return D;

00185     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00186             Vector<D, N> &Vector<D, N>::operator+= (const Vector<D, N> &Y) {
00187         for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++) x[i] += Y.x[i];
00188         return *this;
00189     }
00190 
00191     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00192             Vector<D, N> &Vector<D, N>::operator-= (const Vector<D, N> &Y) {
00193         for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++) x[i] -= Y.x[i];
00194         return *this;
00195     }

00197     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00198             Vector<D, N> &Vector<D, N>::operator*= (const N &s) {
00199     for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++) x[i] *= s;
00200     return *this;
00201     }

00203     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00204             Vector<D, N> Vector<D, N>::operator- (void) const {
00205         static Vector<D, N> Z;
00206         Z = *this;
00207         for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++) Z.x[i] = -x[i] ;
00208         return Z;
00209     }

00211     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00212             Vector<D, N> Vector<D, N>::operator+ (const Vector<D, N> &Y) const {
00213     static Vector<D, N> Z;
00214     Z = *this;
00215     return (Z += Y);
00216     }
00217 
00218     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00219             Vector<D, N> Vector<D, N>::operator- (const Vector<D, N> &Y) const {
00220     static Vector<D, N> Z;
00221     Z = *this;
00222     return (Z -= Y);
00223     }

00225     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00226             Vector<D, N> Vector<D, N>::operator* (const N &s) const {
00227     Vector <D, N>Z;
00228     Z = *this;
00229     return Z *= s;
00230     }
00231 
00232     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00233             N Vector<D, N>::operator* (const Vector<D, N> &Y) const {
00234     N dot = 0.;
00235     for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++)
00236         if (x[i]) dot += x[i]*Y.x[i];
00237 
00238     return dot;
00239     }
00240 
00241     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00242             Vector<D, N> Vector<D, N>::operator/ (const N &s) const {
00243     return operator* (1./s);
00244     }
00245 
00246     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00247             Vector<D, N> Vector<D, N>::operator/ (const Vector<D, N> &X) const {
00248         Vector<D, N> tmp;
00249         for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++)
00250             tmp[i] = x[i]/X[i];
00251         return tmp;
00252     }

00255     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00256             N Vector<D, N>::sqnorm (void) const {
00257         return operator* (*this);
00258     }

00268     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00269             std::ostream &operator << (std::ostream &o, const Vector<D, N> &v) {
00270         //  i might want to use other brackets one day
00271         o << "<";
00272         for (unsigned i = 0; i < v.dimension ()-1; i++) o << v[i] << ",";
00273         o << v[v.dimension ()-1] << ">";
00274         return o;
00275     }
00276 
00278 
00282     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00283             std::istringstream &operator >> (std::istringstream &in, Vector<D, N> &v) {
00284         char bracket;
00285         while (bracket != '<' && !in.eof()) { in >> bracket; }
00286         for (unsigned i = 0; i < v.dimension ()-1; i++) {
00287             in >> v[i] >> bracket;
00288         }
00289         in >> v[v.dimension ()-1] >> bracket;
00290         return in;
00291     }

00310 
00314     template <typename N>
00315             Vector<3, N> vcross (Vector<3, N> a, Vector<3, N> b) {
00316         static Vector<3, N> c;
00317 
00318         c[0] = a[1]*b[2]-a[2]*b[1];
00319         c[1] = a[2]*b[0]-a[0]*b[2];
00320         c[2] = a[0]*b[1]-a[1]*b[0];
00321 
00322         return c;
00323     }
00324 
00326 
00331     template <typename N>
00332             Vector<4, N> vcross (Vector<4, N> a, Vector<4, N> b, Vector<4, N> c) {
00333         static Vector<4, N> d;
00334         N A = b[0]*c[1]-b[1]*c[0],
00335         B = b[0]*c[2]-b[2]*c[0],
00336         C = b[0]*c[3]-b[3]*c[0],
00337         D = b[1]*c[2]-b[2]*c[1],
00338         E = b[1]*c[3]-b[3]*c[1],
00339         F = b[2]*c[3]-b[3]*c[2];
00340 
00341         d[0] =  a[1]*F - a[2]*E + a[3]*D;
00342         d[1] = -a[0]*F + a[2]*C - a[3]*B;
00343         d[2] =  a[0]*E - a[1]*C + a[3]*A;
00344         d[3] = -a[0]*D + a[1]*B - a[2]*A;
00345 
00346         return d;
00347     }
00348 
00350 
00353     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00354             Vector<D, N> vnormalize( const Vector<D, N> &x ) {
00355         static Vector<D, N> n;
00356         N norm = sqrt ( x.sqnorm() );
00357         for ( unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++ ) n[i] = x[i]/norm;
00358         return n;
00359     }
